channel.title: Movies on Flexible, Powerful Static Website Creation With Hugo

item.title: the big lebowski
item.description:
Plot

When “The Dude” Lebowski is mistaken for a millionaire Lebowskeai, two thugs urinate on his rug to coerce him into paying a debt he knows nothing about. While attempting to gain recompense for the ruined rug from his wealthy counterpart, he accepts a one-time job with high pay-off. He enlists the help of his bowling buddy, Walter, a gun-toting Jewish-convert with anger issues. Deception leads to more trouble, and it soon seems that everyone from porn empire tycoons to nihilists want something from The Dude.

My Obervations

  1. All the protagonists are bowlers.
  2. All the antagonists are artists.
  3. Like in Roadhouse, Sam Elliott is awesome!

Memorable Quotes

“Hey, careful man, there’s a beverage here!” - The Dude

“Smokey, my friend, you are entering a world of pain.” - Walter Sobchak

“Those are good burgers, Walter.” — Donny
